SAMPLE.alias: Anopheles funestus from field Kela (Mali) and FUMOZ-R (a lab pyrethroid resistant strain)
SAMPLE.TITLE: Generic sample from Anopheles funestus
SAMPLE.DESCRIPTION: Total RNA was extracted from different life-stages of two strains of An. funestus, FUMOZ-R a laboratory strain resistant to pyrethroids and a field collected pyrethroid susceptible sample from Kela, a village in Mali.
